name: Sapling (itch)
description:
Click to plant trees. When they die, you gain all nutrients (represented by the numbers) that was on that tile, and can use those to plant seeds.

Rate it here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/sapling

A tree-based game by turbosocks.itch.io and I.

Music by I.

Bird sounds from BurghRecords.

Tree SFX from freesound.org.
